QuestData.Title: My Terrible Morning
QuestData.Description:
You simply won't believe what happened to me!
I was out for my daily stroll when Marquis Pummeler and his band of ruffians assailed me!
Amongst the many unfortunate and ungentlemanly behaviors they displayed was destroying my parasol.
A tragedy of the highest order!
Without it, I'm afraid I'm left quite vulnerable to the oppressive Light that curses this land.
The Marquis controls a coveted shaded hideout nearby. Will you avenge my parasol and teach this ruffian some manners?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Ruthless gang leader who controls a shaded area... and hates parasols.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Theotar in the Desiccation.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Exposure to the Light is clearly causing Theotar to lose control of himself.>
Justice... for parasols... everywhere...
